snippet.title: The Sims 3 on Nintendo 3DS Launch Trailer
snippet.description: The First Complete Life Simulation from The Sims™, on the Nintendo 3DS™! Create Sims with unique personalities, fulfill their desires, and control their lives within a living neighborhood. Use the 3DS camera to capture your likeness and create your Sim. Unlock new interactive Karma Powers with Karma Points and unleash amazing effects on your Sims.  Through Nintendo StreetPass, trade your Sims with your 3DS friends!
